titles.title: Medicaid Quality Care Act
To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to promulgate regulations with respect to quality control and oversight of out-of-State care under the Medicaid program.
Medicaid Quality Care Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Medicaid Quality Care Act
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to issue regulations that require each state Medicaid program to provide quality control and oversight of out-of-state providers.
